body:
Comment 11: 
Re: #6: We'll have to make C program. It takes input that comes via a lot of Go code, so
that's going to be a bit of work.

Re: #7, 8: No. :-) This program is a unit test for a massive part of our codebase, so we
can't share it unfortunately.

Re: #9: will you make one?

Re: #10: I'll get on it.
